name: Facebook Wide - Deprecated
description: Deprecated! You should come HERE with Stylus. After the update of Facebook, I feel it much cleaner. However, the navigations at left/right always annoy me - I want to focus on the news feed flow. Also, some pages (such as Pokes) can but don't use the full width. So I create this to make myself happy. By hovering on the navigations, your cursor can expand
